sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,case ifnull(u.name,'') when '' then '会员' else u.name end as name,w.openid,DATEDIFF(now(),u.register_time) as reg_day from b2b_user.uuc_user u left join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where u.user_biz_type=1 and (Date(u.register_time) BETWEEN date('2016-01-01') and DATE('2016-05-31')) and u.`name` not like 'test%' and r.user_id is null GROUP BY u.user_id,w.openid

sql-item.sql: select substring_index(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT short_name SEPARATOR '、'),'、',3) as dev_names, count(DISTINCT short_name) as dev_cnt,case when count(short_name)<3 then 0 else count(short_name) end as item_cnt from ( select b.short_name,b.title,b.category_name#,b.type,b.developer_type From b2b_user.uuc_user_business_scope a inner join ( select a.title, IFNULL(b.short_name,b.company_name) short_name,b.developer_type,c.category_code,d.category_name,1 as type From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer b on a.developer_uid=b.developer_id inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories c on a.uid=c.bid_announcement_uid INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on c.category_code=d.category_code where b.company_name not like 'test_%' and a.register_end_date>now() and (a.operate_state<>'6' and a.is_valid<>1) and a.procurement_type=0 union ALL select a.`subject`, IFNULL(b.short_name,b.company_name) short_name,b.developer_type,a.categories,d.category_name,2 as type from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item a inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer b on a.company_id=b.developer_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on a.categories=d.category_code where b.company_name not like 'test_%' and a.register_end_date>now() and a.state<>'3' )b on a.business_scope= b.category_code where a.user_id=@user_id order by b.type, b.developer_type ) a

SELECT CONCAT('●',GROUP_CONCAT(nr SEPARATOR '●')) as nr FROM ( select CONCAT('[',b.short_name,']','发布了','[',b.category_name,']','\r\n') nr#,b.type,b.developer_type From b2b_user.uuc_user_business_scope a inner join ( select IFNULL(b.short_name,b.company_name) short_name,b.developer_type,c.category_code,CONCAT(d.category_name,'招标公告') as category_name,1 as type From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer b on a.developer_uid=b.developer_id inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories c on a.uid=c.bid_announcement_uid INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on c.category_code=d.category_code where b.company_name not like 'test_%' and a.register_end_date>now() and (a.operate_state<>'6' and a.is_valid<>1) and a.procurement_type=0 union ALL select IFNULL(b.short_name,b.company_name) short_name,b.developer_type,a.categories,CONCAT(d.category_name,'招募公告') as category_name,2 as type from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item a inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer b on a.company_id=b.developer_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on a.categories=d.category_code where b.company_name not like 'test_%' and a.register_end_date>now() and a.state<>'3' )b on a.business_scope= b.category_code where a.user_id=@user_id GROUP BY b.short_name order by b.type, b.developer_type LIMIT 3 ) zz
